Class WaterGun

java.lang.Object
KI302.Tokar.Lab3.Gun
KI302.Tokar.Lab3.WaterGun
public class WaterGun extends KI302.Tokar.Lab3.Gun
Class representing a water gun, which is a specific type of gun. It extends the Gun class.

      Parameters:
      model - The model of the water gun.
      barrel - The barrel of the water gun.
      trigger - The trigger of the water gun.
      calendar - The calendar (manufacturing date) of the water gun.
      waterLevel - The initial water level.
